# target

**Instance Property**

The node toward which constrained nodes will point after being reoriented.

## Declaration

```swift
var target: SCNNode? { get set }
```

## Modifying a Constraint

- **isGimbalLockEnabled**: A Boolean value that specifies whether constrained nodes are allowed to rotate.

items.description: A Boolean value that specifies whether constrained nodes are allowed to rotate.
